name: Shleepies Dreamies
description:
Our favourite sheep, Shleepie, is sleeping after a busy day. Let's journey into the subconscious of this adorable sheep and find out what happy dreams Shleepie might be having.

Controls:

A to move left and D to move right.

SPACE to jump.

LEFT CLICK to shoot.

No there is no multiplayer.

Note from the devs:

Our team mascot is feeling a bit under the weather. We hope she gets better soon!💚
